document_data.mainbody:
Greater elemental summoning was a powerful spell used by clerics, druids and shamans.
When cast, this spell summoned one of three Princes of Elemental Good—Chan, Sunnis, or Zaaman Rul—randomly from either the Elemental Plane of Air, Earth or Fire. The summoned Elemental Prince obeyed the caster but only remained on the casters plane for about ten minutes before returning to their home plane.
